name: Desert Bus Text Adventure
description:
This game is a joke, no literally a joke. The charity event desert bus is starting, check out desertbus.org

I had the idea of making a text based game just driving the bus. I'm in the middle of a thesis so I'm not going to devote much time to this. It's nothing but a console program written in C# with no bus stops or easter eggs. if you actually earn a point or bug splat feel free to link a screenshot to it in the comments.

if there is one I will fix bugs really quickly but like I said this is a joke.

please don't try to give me money for this, give to desert bus instead.
